name: Junior Suite
description: Located on the 1st and 2nd floors with the garden and city view, the two-bedroom King Suites welcome you to a 100 to 110 sq m room offering modern and elegant settings. Decorated in warm earthy colors, the rooms offer 2 king beds and deluxe amenities including a kitchen counter, dining table for four, large cabinet, dressing table with mirror, living area with flat-screen TV for 4 to 6 people and bathroom with shower.

name: Business King
description: Located on the 1st and 2nd floors with the garden and city view, Honeymoon Suites welcome you to a 75 to 85 sq m room offering modern and elegant settings. Decorated in warm earthy colors, the rooms offer king bed and deluxe amenities including a kitchen counter, dining table for four, large cabinet, dressing table with mirror, living area with flat-screen TV for 4 to 6 people and bathroom with shower.

name: Deluxe Suite
description: Located on the 1st and 2nd floors with the garden and city view, Deluxe Suites welcome you to a 60 to 65 sq m room offering modern and elegant settings. Decorated in warm earthy colors, the rooms offer king bed or twin beds with deluxe amenities including a kitchen counter, dining table for four, large cabinet, dressing table with mirror, living area with flat-screen TV for 4 to 6 people and bathroom with shower.

name: Family Suite
description: Located on the 1st and 2nd floors with the garden and city view, Family Suites welcome you to a 70 to 75 sq m room offering modern and elegant settings. Decorated in warm earthy colors, the rooms offer king bed and a special children nest. Deluxe amenities include a kitchen counter, dining table for four, large cabinet, dressing table with mirror, living area with flat-screen TV for 4 to 6 people and bathroom with shower.

name: Honeymoon Suite
description: Located on the 1st and 2nd floors with the garden and city view, Honeymoon Suites welcome you to a 75 to 85 sq m room offering modern and elegant settings. Decorated in warm earthy colors, the rooms offer king bed and deluxe amenities including a kitchen counter, dining table for four, large cabinet, dressing table with mirror, living area with flat-screen TV for 4 to 6 people and bathroom with shower.

name: King Suite
description: Located on the 1st and 2nd floors with the garden and city view, the two-bedroom King Suites welcome you to a 100 to 110 sq m room offering modern and elegant settings. Decorated in warm earthy colors, the rooms offer 2 king beds and deluxe amenities including a kitchen counter, dining table for four, large cabinet, dressing table with mirror, living area with flat-screen TV for 4 to 6 people and bathroom with shower.
